 3105: 
 3106: spawn_huge_arglist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3107:     %% Huge in two different ways; encoded size and
 3108:     %% length...
 3109:     ArgListHead = [make_ref(),
 3110:                    lists:duplicate(1000000, $a),
 3111:                    <<1:8388608>>,
 3112:                    processes(),
 3113:                    erlang:ports(),
 3114:                    {hej, hopp},
 3115:                    <<17:8388608>>,
 3116:                    lists:duplicate(3000000, $x),
 3117:                    #{ a => 1, b => 2, c => 3, d => 4, e => 5}],
 3118:     ArgList = ArgListHead ++ lists:seq(1, 255 - length(ArgListHead)),
 3119: 
 3120:     io:format("size(term_to_binary(ArgList)) = ~p~n",
 3121:               [size(term_to_binary(ArgList))]),
 3122: 
 3123:     io:format("Testing spawn with huge argument list on local node...~n", []),
 3124:     spawn_huge_arglist_test(true, node(), ArgList),
 3125:     io:format("Testing spawn with huge argument list on local node with Node...~n", []),
 3126:     spawn_huge_arglist_test(false, node(), ArgList),
 3127:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3128:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3129:     io:format("Testing spawn with huge argument list on remote node ~p...~n", [Node]),
 3130:     spawn_huge_arglist_test(false, Node, ArgList),
 3131:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3132:     ok.
 3133: 
 3134: spawn_huge_arglist_test(Local, Node, ArgList) ->
 3135: 
 3136:     R1 = case Local of
 3137:              true ->
 3138:                  spawn_request(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor]);
 3139:              false ->
 3140:                  spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor])
 3141:          end,
 3142:     receive
 3143:         {spawn_reply, R1, ok, Pid1} ->
 3144:             Pid1 ! go,
 3145:             receive
 3146:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, Pid1, Reason1} ->
 3147:                     ArgList = Reason1
 3148:             end
 3149:     end,
 3150: 
 3151:     {Pid2, R2} = case Local of
 3152:                      true ->
 3153:                          spawn_monitor(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList);
 3154:                      false ->
 3155:                          spawn_monitor(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList)
 3156:                  end,
 3157:     Node = node(Pid2),
 3158:     Pid2 ! go,
 3159:     receive
 3160:         {'DOWN', R2, process, Pid2, Reason2} ->
 3161:             ArgList = Reason2
 3162:     end,
 3163:     
 3164:     {Pid3, R3} = case Local of
 3165:                      true ->
 3166:                          spawn_opt(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor]);
 3167:                      false ->
 3168:                          spawn_opt(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor])
 3169:                  end,
 3170:     Node = node(Pid3),
 3171:     Pid3 ! go,
 3172:     receive
 3173:         {'DOWN', R3, process, Pid3, Reason3} ->
 3174:             ArgList = Reason3
 3175:     end,
 3176: 
 3177:     OldTA = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3178:     Pid4 = case Local of
 3179:                true ->
 3180:                    spawn_link(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList);
 3181:                false ->
 3182:                    spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList)
 3183:            end,
 3184:     Node = node(Pid4),
 3185:     Pid4 ! go,
 3186:     receive
 3187:         {'EXIT', Pid4, Reason4} ->
 3188:             ArgList = Reason4
 3189:     end,
 3190: 
 3191:     true = process_flag(trap_exit, OldTA),
 3192: 
 3193:     Pid5 = case Local of
 3194:                true ->
 3195:                    spawn(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList);
 3196:                false ->
 3197:                    spawn(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList)
 3198:            end,
 3199:     Node = node(Pid5),
 3200:     R5 = erlang:monitor(process, Pid5),
 3201:     Pid5 ! go,
 3202:     receive
 3203:         {'DOWN', R5, process, Pid5, Reason5} ->
 3204:             ArgList = Reason5
 3205:     end,
 3206:     ok.
 3207: 
 3208: spawn_request_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3209:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on local node...~n", []),
 3210:     spawn_request_bif_test(true, node()),
 3211:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on local node with Node...~n", []),
 3212:     spawn_request_bif_test(false, node()),
 3213:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3214:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on remote node ~p...~n", [Node]),
 3215:     spawn_request_bif_test(false, Node),
 3216:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3217:     ok.
 3218:                        
 3219: spawn_request_bif_test(Local, Node) ->
 3220: 
 3221:     Me = self(),
 3222: 
 3223:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3224: 
 3225:     T1 = {test, 1},
 3226:     F1 = fun () -> exit({exit, T1}) end,
 3227:     R1 = if Local ->
 3228:                  spawn_request(F1, [{reply_tag, T1}, monitor, link]);
 3229:             true ->
 3230:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [{reply_tag, T1}, monitor, link])
 3231:          end,
 3232:     receive
 3233:         {T1, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3234:             receive
 3235:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, {exit, T1}} ->
 3236:                     ok
 3237:             end,
 3238:             receive
 3239:                 {'EXIT', P1, {exit, T1}} ->
 3240:                     ok
 3241:             end
 3242:     end,
 3243: 
 3244:     R1b = if Local ->
 3245:                  spawn_request(F1, [monitor, link]);
 3246:             true ->
 3247:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [monitor, link])
 3248:          end,
 3249:     receive
 3250:         {spawn_reply, R1b, ok, P1b} ->
 3251:             receive
 3252:                 {'DOWN', R1b, process, P1b, {exit, T1}} ->
 3253:                     ok
 3254:             end,
 3255:             receive
 3256:                 {'EXIT', P1b, {exit, T1}} ->
 3257:                     ok
 3258:             end
 3259:     end,
 3260: 
 3261:     Ref1c = make_ref(),
 3262:     F1c = fun () -> Me ! Ref1c end,
 3263:     R1c = if Local ->
 3264:                   spawn_request(F1c);
 3265:              true ->
 3266:                   spawn_request(Node, F1c)
 3267:             end,
 3268:     receive
 3269:         {spawn_reply, R1c, ok, _P1c} ->
 3270:             receive Ref1c -> ok end
 3271:     end,
 3272: 
 3273:     R1e = if Local ->
 3274:                  spawn_request(F1, [monitors, links, {reply_tag, T1}]);
 3275:             true ->
 3276:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [monitors, links, {reply_tag, T1}])
 3277:          end,
 3278:     receive
 3279:         {T1, R1e, error, BadOpt1} ->
 3280:             badopt = BadOpt1,
 3281:             ok
 3282:     end,
 3283:     ok = try
 3284:              BadF = fun (X) -> exit({X,T1}) end,
 3285:              if Local ->
 3286:                      spawn_request(BadF, [monitor, {reply_tag, T1}, link]);
 3287:                 true ->
 3288:                      spawn_request(Node, BadF, [monitor, {reply_tag, T1}, link])
 3289:              end,
 3290:              nok
 3291:          catch
 3292:              error:badarg -> ok
 3293:          end,
 3294:     ok = try
 3295:              spawn_request(<<"node">>, F1, [monitor, link], T1),
 3296:              nok
 3297:          catch
 3298:              error:badarg -> ok
 3299:          end,
 3300: 
 3301:     T2 = {test, 2},
 3302:     M2 = erlang,
 3303:     F2 = exit,
 3304:     Reason2 = {exit, T2},
 3305:     Args2 = [Reason2],
 3306:     R2 = if Local ->
 3307:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}]);
 3308:             true ->
 3309:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}])
 3310:             end,
 3311:     receive
 3312:         {T2, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3313:             receive
 3314:                 {'DOWN', R2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3315:                     ok
 3316:             end,
 3317:             receive
 3318:                 {'EXIT', P2, Reason2} ->
 3319:                     ok
 3320:             end
 3321:     end,
 3322: 
 3323:     R2b = if Local ->
 3324:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link]);
 3325:             true ->
 3326:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link])
 3327:             end,
 3328:     receive
 3329:         {spawn_reply, R2b, ok, P2b} ->
 3330:             receive
 3331:                 {'DOWN', R2b, process, P2b, Reason2} ->
 3332:                     ok
 3333:             end,
 3334:             receive
 3335:                 {'EXIT', P2b, Reason2} ->
 3336:                     ok
 3337:             end
 3338:     end,
 3339:

 3342:                   spawn_request(erlang, send, [Me, Ref2c]);

 3345:             end,
 3346:     receive

 3352:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, {reply_tag, T2}, links]);

 3358:             badopt = BadOpt2,
 3359:             ok

 3369:             badopt = BadOpt2b,

 3371:     end,

 3484: spawn_request_monitor_demonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3485:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3486:     BlockFun = fun () ->
 3487:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 3488:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, 1000),
 3489:                        ok
 3490:                end,
 3491: 
 3492:     %% Block receiver node...
 3493:     spawn_request(Node, BlockFun, [{priority,max}, link]),
 3494:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 3495: 
 3496:     erlang:yield(),
 3497:     R = spawn_request(Node, timer, sleep, [10000], [monitor]),
 3498:     %% Should not be possible to demonitor
 3499:     %% before operation has succeeded...
 3500:     {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3501:     false = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]), %% Should be ignored by VM...
 3502:     receive
 3503:         {spawn_reply, R, ok, P} ->
 3504:             {monitors, [{process,P}]} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3505:             true = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]),
 3506:             {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3507:             exit(P, kill)
 3508:     end,
 3509:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3510:     ok.
 3511: 
 3512: spawn_request_monitor_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3513:     %% Early child exit...
 3514:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3515:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [monitor, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3516:     receive
 3517:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3518:             receive
 3519:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3520:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3521:             end
 3522:     end,
 3523:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3524:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, monitor]),
 3525:     receive
 3526:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3527:             receive
 3528:                 {'DOWN', R2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3529:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3530:             end
 3531:     end,
 3532:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3533:     ok.
 3534: 
 3535: spawn_request_link_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3536:     %% Early child exit...
 3537:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3538:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3539:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, link]),
 3540:     receive
 3541:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3542:             receive
 3543:                 {'EXIT', P1, Reason1} ->
 3544:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3545:             end
 3546:     end,
 3547:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3548:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [link, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3549:     receive
 3550:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3551:             receive
 3552:                 {'EXIT', P2, Reason2} ->
 3553:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3554:             end
 3555:     end,
 3556:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3557:     ok.
 3558: 
 3559: spawn_request_link_parent_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3560:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), false),
 3561:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3562:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, false),
 3563:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3564:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3565: 
 3566: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_compound_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3567:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), true),
 3568:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3569:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, true),
 3570:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3571:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3572: 
 3573: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, CompoundExitReason) ->
 3574:     %% Early parent exit...
 3575:     Tester = self(),
 3576: 
 3577:     ExitReason = if CompoundExitReason -> "kaboom";
 3578:                     true -> kaboom
 3579:                  end,
 3580: 
 3581:     verify_nc(node()),
 3582: 
 3583:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3584:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3585: 
 3586:     ParentFun = case node() == Node of
 3587:                     true ->
 3588:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3589:                                 spawn_request(?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3590:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3591:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3592:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3593:                         end;
 3594:                     false ->
 3595:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3596:                                 spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3597:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3598:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3599:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3600:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3601:                         end
 3602:                 end,
 3603:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3604:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3605:                                             %% Give parent some work to do when
 3606:                                             %% exiting and by this increase
 3607:                                             %% possibilities for races...
 3608:                                             T = ets:new(x,[]),
 3609:                                             ets:insert(T, lists:map(fun (I) ->
 3610:                                                                             {I,I}
 3611:                                                                     end,
 3612:                                                                     lists:seq(1,10000))),
 3613:                                             ParentFun(N rem 10) end,
 3614:                                     [{priority, max}])
 3615:                   end,
 3616:                   lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 3617:     N = gather_parent_exits(ExitReason, false),
 3618:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3619:                     fun () ->
 3620:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3621:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3622:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3623:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3624:                                       end, processes())
 3625:                     end),
 3626:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3627:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3628:                       (_) ->
 3629:                           ok
 3630:                   end, CFs),
 3631:     Comment =
 3632:         "Got "
 3633:         ++ integer_to_list(N)
 3634:         ++ if node() == Node -> " node local";
 3635:                   true -> " node remote"
 3636:            end
 3637:         ++ if CompoundExitReason -> " \"kaboom\"";
 3638:               true -> " \'kaboom\'"
 3639:            end
 3640:         ++ " exits!",
 3641:     erlang:display(Comment),
 3642:     Comment.
 3643: 
 3644: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3645:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3646:     N = 1000,
 3647:     ExitCounter = spawn(Node, fun exit_counter/0),
 3648:     lists:foreach(fun (_) ->
 3649:                           spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node)
 3650:                   end,
 3651:                   lists:seq(1, N)),
 3652:     ResRef = make_ref(),
 3653:     ExitCounter ! {get_results, self(), ResRef},
 3654:     Cmnt = receive
 3655:                {ResRef, CntMap} ->
 3656:                    lists:flatten(
 3657:                      ["In total ", integer_to_list(N), " exits. ",
 3658:                       "Detected exits: ",
 3659:                       maps:fold(fun (ExitReason, Count, "") ->
 3660:                                         io_lib:format("~p exit ~p times",
 3661:                                                       [ExitReason, Count]);
 3662:                                     (ExitReason, Count, Acc) ->
 3663:                                         [Acc, io_lib:format("; ~p exit ~p times",
 3664:                                                             [ExitReason, Count])]
 3665:                                 end,
 3666:                                 "",
 3667:                                 CntMap),
 3668:                       "."])
 3669:            end,
 3670:     io:format("~s~n", [Cmnt]),
 3671:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3672:     {comment, Cmnt}.
 3673: 
 3674: exit_counter() ->
 3675:     true = register(exit_counter, self()),
 3676:     exit_counter(#{}).
 3677: 
 3678: exit_counter(CntMap) ->
 3679:     receive
 3680:         {get_results, From, Ref} ->
 3681:             From ! {Ref, CntMap};
 3682:         {exit, Reason} ->
 3683:             OldCnt = maps:get(Reason, CntMap, 0),
 3684:             exit_counter(CntMap#{Reason => OldCnt+1})
 3685:     end.
 3686: 
 3687: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node) ->
 3688:     pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 3689:     ChildFun = fun () ->
 3690:                        process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3691:                        receive
 3692:                            {'EXIT', _, Reason} ->
 3693:                                exit_counter ! {exit, Reason}
 3694:                        end
 3695:                end,
 3696:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 3697:                                        _ReqID = spawn_request(Node,
 3698:                                                               ChildFun,
 3699:                                                               [link,
 3700:                                                                {priority,max}]),
 3701:                                        exit(bye)
 3702:                                end),
 3703:     receive
 3704:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3705:             bye = Reason,
 3706:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node)
 3707:     end,
 3708:     ok.
 3709: 
 3710: 
 3711: spawn_request_abandon_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3712:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3713:     false = spawn_request_abandon(make_ref()),
 3714:     false = spawn_request_abandon(spawn_request(fun () -> ok end)),
 3715:     false = spawn_request_abandon(rpc:call(Node, erlang, make_ref, [])),
 3716:     try
 3717:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(self()) 
 3718:     catch
 3719:         error:badarg ->
 3720:             ok
 3721:     end,
 3722:     try
 3723:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(4711)
 3724:     catch
 3725:         error:badarg ->
 3726:             ok
 3727:     end,
 3728: 
 3729:     verify_nc(node()),
 3730: 
 3731:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3732:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3733: 
 3734: 
 3735:     TotOps = 1000,
 3736:     Tester = self(),
 3737: 
 3738:     ParentFun = fun (Wait, Opts) ->
 3739:                         ReqId = spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3740:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3741:                                               [Tester], Opts),
 3742:                         receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3743:                         case spawn_request_abandon(ReqId) of
 3744:                             true ->
 3745:                                 ok;
 3746:                             false ->
 3747:                                 receive
 3748:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, _} ->
 3749:                                         exit(spawn_failed);
 3750:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, Pid} ->
 3751:                                         unlink(Pid),
 3752:                                         exit(Pid, bye)
 3753:                                 after
 3754:                                     0 ->
 3755:                                         exit(missing_spawn_reply)
 3756:                                 end
 3757:                         end
 3758:                 end,
 3759:     %% Parent exit early...
 3760:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3761:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3762:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link])
 3763:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3764:                   end,
 3765:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3766:     NoA1 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3767:     %% Parent exit late...
 3768:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3769:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3770:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link]),
 3771:                                             receive
 3772:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3773:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3774:                                             after
 3775:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3776:                                             end
 3777:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3778:                   end,
 3779:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3780:     NoA2 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3781:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3782:                     fun () ->
 3783:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3784:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3785:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3786:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3787:                                       end, processes())
 3788:                     end),
 3789:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3790:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3791:                       (_) ->
 3792:                           ok
 3793:                   end, CFs),
 3794:     %% Parent exit early...
 3795:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3796:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3797:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [])
 3798:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3799:                   end,
 3800:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3801:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3802:     %% Parent exit late...
 3803:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3804:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3805:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, []),
 3806:                                             receive
 3807:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3808:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3809:                                             after
 3810:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3811:                                             end
 3812:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3813:                   end,
 3814:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3815:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3816:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3817:     C = "Got " ++ integer_to_list(NoA1) ++ " and "
 3818:         ++ integer_to_list(NoA2) ++ " abandoneds of 2*"
 3819:         ++ integer_to_list(TotOps) ++ " ops!",
 3820:     true = NoA1 /= 0,
 3821:     true = NoA1 /= TotOps,
 3822:     true = NoA2 /= 0,
 3823:     true = NoA2 /= TotOps,
 3824:     {comment, C}.
 3825: 
 3826: spawn_request_test_exit_child(Tester) ->
 3827:   Child = self(),
 3828:   _ = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3829:                         process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3830:                         receive
 3831:                             {'EXIT', Child, Reason} ->
 3832:                                 Tester ! {parent_exit, Reason}
 3833:                         end
 3834:                 end, [link,{priority,max}]),
 3835:   receive after infinity -> ok end.
 3836: 
 3837: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther) ->
 3838:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3839:     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, 0).
 3840: 
 3841: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N) ->
 3842:     receive
 3843:         {parent_exit, Reason} ->
 3844:             gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N+1);
 3845:         {parent_exit, _} = ParentExit ->
 3846:             case AllowOther of
 3847:                 false ->
 3848:                     ct:fail(ParentExit);
 3849:                 true ->
 3850:                     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N)
 3851:             end
 3852:     after 0 ->
 3853:             N
 3854:     end.
 3855: dist_spawn_monitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3856:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3857:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3858:     receive
 3859:         {spawn_reply, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3860:             receive
 3861:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3862:                     hej = Reason1
 3863:             end
 3864:     end,
 3865:     {P2, Mon2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3866:     receive
 3867:         {'DOWN', Mon2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3868:             hej = Reason2
 3869:     end,
 3870:     {P3, Mon3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3871:     receive
 3872:         {'DOWN', Mon3, process, P3, Reason3} ->
 3873:             hej = Reason3
 3874:     end,
 3875:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3876:     ok.
 3877: 
 3878: spawn_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3879:     %% Spawn against an ei node which does not support spawn
 3880:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
 3881:     try
 3882:         %% First spawn triggering a new connection; which
 3883:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3884:         %% of spawn requests...
 3885:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3886:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, true),
 3887:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3888:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3889:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, false),
 3890:         ok
 3891:     after
 3892:         ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode)
 3893:     end.
 3894: 
 3895: spawn_against_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3896:     %% Same spawn tests against a two releases old node as against
 3897:     %% ei node above
 3898:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2),
 3899:     OldRelName = OldRel ++ "_latest",
 3900:     %% We clear all ERL_FLAGS for the old node as all options may not
 3901:     %% be supported.
 3902:     ClearEnv = lists:foldl(
 3903:                  fun({Key,_Value}, Acc) ->
 3904:                          case re:run(Key,"^ERL_.*FLAGS$") of
 3905:                              {match,_} ->
 3906:                                  [{Key,""}|Acc];
 3907:                              nomatch ->
 3908:                                  Acc
 3909:                          end
 3910:                  end, [], os:env()),
 3911:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0, env => ClearEnv },
 3912:                       OldRelName,
 3913:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 3914: 	not_available ->
 3915:             {skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"};
 3916:         {ok, Peer, OldNode} ->
 3917:             try
 3918:                 %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 3919:                 %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3920:                 %% of spawn requests...
 3921:                 io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3922:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, true),
 3923:                 io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3924:                 %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3925:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, false),
 3926:                 ok
 3927:             after
 3928:                 peer:stop(Peer)
 3929:             end
 3930:     end.
 3931: 
 3932: spawn_against_new_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3933:     {ok, Peer, CurrNode} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3934:     try
 3935:         %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 3936:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3937:         %% of spawn requests...
 3938:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3939:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, true),
 3940:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3941:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3942:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, false),
 3943:         ok
 3944:     after
 3945:         peer:stop(Peer)
 3946:     end.
 3947: 
 3948: spawn_ei_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 3949:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() against ei node...", []),
 3950:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3951:     Ref1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 3952:     receive
 3953:         {a_tag, Ref1, Err, Notsup} ->
 3954:             error = Err,
 3955:             notsup = Notsup,
 3956:             ok
 3957:     end,
 3958:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor() against ei node...", []),
 3959:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3960:     try
 3961:         spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej])
 3962:     catch
 3963:         error:notsup ->
 3964:             ok
 3965:     end,
 3966:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor against ei node...", []),
 3967:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3968:     {P0, M0} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3969:     receive
 3970:         {'DOWN', M0, process, P0, R0} ->
 3971:             notsup = R0
 3972:     end,
 3973:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link against ei node...", []),
 3974:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3975:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3976:     P1 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 3977:     receive
 3978:         {'EXIT', P1, R1} ->
 3979:             notsup = R1
 3980:     end,
 3981:     io:format("Testing spawn_link() against ei node...", []),
 3982:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3983:     P2 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3984:     receive
 3985:         {'EXIT', P2, R2} ->
 3986:             notsup = R2
 3987:     end,
 3988:     ok.
 3989: 
 3990: disconnect_node(_Node, false) ->
 3991:     ok;
 3992: disconnect_node(Node, true) ->
 3993:     lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])) andalso begin
 3994:         monitor_node(Node, true),
 3995:         true = erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 3996:         receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end
 3997:     end.
 3998: 
 3999: spawn_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 4000:     io:format("Testing spawn_request()...", []),
 4001:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4002:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 4003:     receive
 4004:         {a_tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 4005:             Node = node(P1),
 4006:             receive
 4007:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, hej} -> ok
 4008:             end
 4009:     end,
 4010:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor()...", []),
 4011:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4012:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 4013:     receive
 4014:         {'DOWN', M2, process, P2, hej} -> ok
 4015:     end,
 4016:     Node = node(P2),
 4017:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor...", []),
 4018:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4019:     {P3, M3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 4020:     receive
 4021:         {'DOWN', M3, process, P3, hej} -> ok
 4022:     end,
 4023:     Node = node(P3),
 4024:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link...", []),
 4025:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4026:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4027:     P4 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 4028:     Node = node(P4),
 4029:     receive
 4030:         {'EXIT', P4, hej} ->
 4031:             ok
 4032:     end,
 4033:     io:format("Testing spawn_link()...", []),
 4034:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4035:     P5 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 4036:     Node = node(P5),
 4037:     receive
 4038:         {'EXIT', P5, hej} ->
 4039:             ok
 4040:     end.
