 4042: spawn_request_reply_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4043:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(undefined, node()),
 4044:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4045:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node).
 4046:     
 4047: spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node) ->
 4048:     io:format("Testing on node: ~p~n", [Node]),
 4049:     Parent = self(),
 4050:     Done1 = make_ref(),
 4051:     RID1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done1 end, [{reply, yes}]),
 4052:     receive Done1 -> ok end,
 4053:     receive
 4054:         {spawn_reply, RID1, ok, _} -> ok
 4055:     after 0 ->
 4056:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 4057:     end,
 4058:     Done2 = make_ref(),
 4059:     RID2 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done2 end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 4060:     receive Done2 -> ok end,
 4061:     receive
 4062:         {spawn_reply, RID2, ok, _} -> ok
 4063:     after 0 ->
 4064:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 4065:     end,
 4066:     Done3 = make_ref(),
 4067:     RID3 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done3 end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 4068:     receive Done3 -> ok end,
 4069:     receive
 4070:         {spawn_reply, RID3, _, _} ->
 4071:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4072:     after 0 ->
 4073:             ok
 4074:     end,
 4075:     Done4 = make_ref(),
 4076:     RID4 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done4 end, [{reply, no}]),
 4077:     receive Done4 -> ok end,
 4078:     receive
 4079:         {spawn_reply, RID4, _, _} ->
 4080:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4081:     after 0 ->
 4082:             ok
 4083:     end,
 4084:     RID5 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}, bad_option]),
 4085:     receive
 4086:         {spawn_reply, RID5, error, badopt} -> ok
 4087:     end,
 4088:     RID6 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}, bad_option]),
 4089:     receive
 4090:         {spawn_reply, RID6, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4091:     after 1000 -> ok
 4092:     end,
 4093:     RID7 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}, bad_option]),
 4094:     receive
 4095:         {spawn_reply, RID7, error, badopt} -> ok
 4096:     end,
 4097:     RID8 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}, bad_option]),
 4098:     receive
 4099:         {spawn_reply, RID8, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4100:     after 1000 -> ok
 4101:     end,
 4102:     RID8_1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, nahh}]),
 4103:     receive
 4104:         {spawn_reply, RID8_1, error, badopt} -> ok
 4105:     end,
 4106:     case Node == node() of
 4107:         true ->
 4108:             ok;
 4109:         false ->
 4110:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4111:             RID9 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}]),
 4112:             receive
 4113:                 {spawn_reply, RID9, error, noconnection} -> ok
 4114:             end,
 4115:             RID10 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 4116:             receive
 4117:                 {spawn_reply, RID10, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4118:             after 1000 -> ok
 4119:             end,
 4120:             RID11 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 4121:             receive
 4122:                 {spawn_reply, RID11, error, noconnection} -> ok
 4123:             end,
 4124:             RID12 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}]),
 4125:             receive
 4126:                 {spawn_reply, RID12, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4127:             after 1000 -> ok
 4128:             end,
 4129:             ok
 4130:     end.
 4131: 
 4132: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4133:     %% A process newly spawned via the distribution is passed the
 4134:     %% argument list to use as the first message followed by an intialization
 4135:     %% message. Those two messages *must* be the first messages in its queue
 4136:     %% when it begins execution. The parallel receive/send signal optimization
 4137:     %% could potentially cause reordering of messages if certain future
 4138:     %% changes are made. This test case tries to cause a situation where a
 4139:     %% message reordering potentially could happen, and hopefully will detect
 4140:     %% such problematic changes.
 4141:     Tester = self(),
 4142:     NoScheds = 8,
 4143:     NoSchedsStr = integer_to_list(NoScheds),
 4144:     NoSchedsList = lists:seq(1, NoScheds),
 4145:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+S"++NoSchedsStr++":"++NoSchedsStr]),
 4146:     AttackMsg = make_ref(),
 4147:     AttackArgList = [Tester, AttackMsg],
 4148:     OkMsg = make_ref(),
 4149:     As = lists:map(
 4150:            fun (_) ->
 4151:                    spawn_opt(
 4152:                      Node,
 4153:                      fun () ->
 4154:                              dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(AttackArgList,
 4155:                                                               1000)
 4156:                      end, [{priority, high}, link])
 4157:            end, NoSchedsList),
 4158:     Relay = spawn_opt(
 4159:               Node,
 4160:               fun () ->
 4161:                       receive
 4162:                           {attack, Victim} ->
 4163:                               lists:foreach(fun (A) ->
 4164:                                                     A ! {attack, Victim}
 4165:                                             end, As)
 4166:                       end
 4167:               end, [{priority, max}, link]),
 4168:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 4169:     Victim = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, send, [Tester, OkMsg],
 4170:                        [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4171:                         {priority, normal},
 4172:                         link]),
 4173:     Relay ! {attack, Victim},
 4174:     receive
 4175:         OkMsg ->
 4176:             ok;
 4177:         AttackMsg ->
 4178:             ct:fail(child_process_used_message_as_argument_list)
 4179:     end,
 4180:     lists:foreach(fun (P) ->
 4181:                           unlink(P)
 4182:                   end, [Victim] ++ [Relay] ++ As),
 4183:     peer:stop(Peer),
 4184:     ok.
 4185: 
 4186: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N) ->
 4187:     receive
 4188:         {attack, Victim} ->
 4189:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Victim, Msg, N)
 4190:     after
 4191:         0 ->
 4192:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N)
 4193:     end.
 4194: 
 4195: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(_Pid, _Msg, 0) ->
 4196:     ok;
 4197: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N) ->
 4198:     Pid ! Msg,
 4199:     dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N-1).
 4200: 
 4201: processes_term_proc_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4202:     Tester = self(),
 4203: 
 4204:     Run = fun(Args) ->
 4205:               {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
 4206:               RT = spawn_link(Node, fun () ->
 4207:                               receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4208:                               as_expected = processes_term_proc_list_test(false),
 4209:                               Tester ! {it_worked, self()}
 4210:                       end),
 4211:               receive {it_worked, RT} -> ok end,
 4212:               stop_node(Peer, Node)
 4213:           end,
 4214: 
 4215:     %% We have to run this test case with +S1 since instrument:allocations()
 4216:     %% will report a free()'d block as present until it's actually deallocated
 4217:     %% by its employer.
 4218:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "false", "+S1"]),
 4219:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "true", "+S1"]),
 4220: 
 4221:     ok.
 4222: 
 4223: processes_iter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4224:     ProcessLimit = erlang:system_info(process_limit),
 4225:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(ProcessLimit + 1),
 4226:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(-1),
 4227:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(1 bsl 32),
 4228:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(1 bsl 64),
 4229:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(abc),
 4230: 
 4231:     none = erts_internal:processes_next(ProcessLimit),
 4232: 
 4233:     ok.
 4234: 
 4235: 
 4236: %% OTP-18322: Send msg to spawning process pid returned from processes/0
 4237: processes_send_infant(_Config) ->
 4238:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of
 4239:         1 ->
 4240:             {skip, "Only one scheduler online"};
 4241:         NScheds ->
 4242:             processes_send_infant_do(NScheds)
 4243:     end.
 4244: 
 4245: processes_send_infant_do(NScheds) ->
 4246:     IgnoreList = erlang:processes(),
 4247:     IgnorePids = maps:from_keys(IgnoreList, ignore),
 4248:     Tester = self(),
 4249: 
 4250:     %% To provoke bug we need sender and spawner on different schedulers.
 4251:     %% Let spawners use schedulers nr 2 to NScheds
 4252:     NSpawnerScheds = NScheds - 1,
 4253:     NSpawners = 2 * NSpawnerScheds,
 4254:     [spawn_link(fun() ->
 4255:                         processes_send_infant_spawner((I rem  NSpawnerScheds) + 2,
 4256:                                                       Tester, Tester, 1)
 4257:                 end)
 4258:      || I <- lists:seq(0, NSpawners-1)],
 4259: 
 4260:     %% and make sure sender use scheduler 1
 4261:     {Sender,SenderMon} =
 4262:         spawn_opt(
 4263:           fun() ->
 4264:                   timeout = processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4265:           end,
 4266:           [link, monitor, {scheduler,1}]),
 4267: 
 4268:     %% Run test for a little while and see if VM crashes
 4269:     {ok, _TRef} = timer:send_after(1000, Sender, timeout),
 4270:     {'DOWN', SenderMon, process, Sender, normal} = receive_any(),
 4271: 
 4272:     %% Stop spawners and collect stats
 4273:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4274:                                     {processes_send_infant, stop},
 4275:                                     IgnorePids),
 4276:     {TotSpawn, TheLastOfUs} =
 4277:         lists:foldl(fun(_, {SpawnCnt, Pids}) ->
 4278:                             {Pid, Generation} = receive_any(),
 4279:                             io:format("Got ~p from ~p\n", [Generation, Pid]),
 4280:                             {SpawnCnt+Generation, [Pid | Pids]}
 4281:                     end,
 4282:                     {0, []},
 4283:                     lists:seq(1, NSpawners)),
 4284:     io:format("Total spawned processes: ~p\n", [TotSpawn]),
 4285:     Aliens = (erlang:processes() -- IgnoreList) -- TheLastOfUs,
 4286:     io:format("Alien processes: ~p\n", [Aliens]),
 4287:     ok.
 4288: 
 4289: 
 4290: 
 4291: processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids) ->
 4292:     %% Send message identifying this test case, in case we send
 4293:     %% to alien processes spawned during the test.
 4294:     Msg = processes_send_infant,
 4295:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4296:                                     Msg,
 4297:                                     IgnorePids),
 4298:     receive timeout -> timeout
 4299:     after 0 ->
 4300:             processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4301:     end.
 4302: 
 4303: processes_send_infant_broadcast([Pid | Tail], Msg, IgnorePids) ->
 4304:     case maps:is_key(Pid, IgnorePids) of
 4305:         false ->
 4306:             Pid ! Msg;
 4307:         true ->
 4308:             ignore
 4309:     end,
 4310:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(Tail, Msg, IgnorePids);
 4311: processes_send_infant_broadcast([], _, _) ->
 4312:     ok.
 4313: 
 4314: processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester, Parent, Generation) ->
 4315:     link(Tester),
 4316:     case receive_any() of
 4317:         processes_send_infant ->
 4318:             case Parent of
 4319:                 Tester -> ok;
 4320:                 _ -> Parent ! {die, self()}
 4321:             end,
 4322:             Self = self(),
 4323:             Child = spawn_opt(fun() ->
 4324:                                       processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester,
 4325:                                                                     Self,
 4326:                                                                     Generation+1)
 4327:                               end,
 4328:                              [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4329:                               {scheduler, Sched}]),
 4330:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4331: 
 4332:         {processes_send_infant, stop} ->
 4333:             Tester ! {self(), Generation}
 4334:     end.
 4335: 
 4336: process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child) ->
 4337:     %% Parent stays alive only to ensure child gets stop message
 4338:     case receive_any() of
 4339:         processes_send_infant ->
 4340:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4341:         {die, Child} ->
 4342:             ok;
 4343:         {processes_send_infant, stop}=Stop ->
 4344:             %% We are not sure child was spawned when stop message was sent
 4345:             %% so we relay it.
 4346:             Child ! Stop
 4347:     end.
 4348: 
 4349: 
 4350: -define(CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MC, XB),
 4351: 	chk_term_proc_list(?LINE, MC, XB)).
 4352: 
 4353: chk_term_proc_list(Line, MustChk, ExpectBlks) ->
 4354:     Allocs = instrument:allocations(),
 4355:     case {MustChk, Allocs} of
 4356: 	{false, {error, not_enabled}} ->
 4357: 	    not_enabled;
 4358: 	{false, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} when ByOrigin =:= #{} ->
 4359: 	    not_enabled;
 4360: 	{_, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} ->
 4361:             ByType = maps:get(system, ByOrigin, #{}),
 4362:             Hist = maps:get(ptab_list_deleted_el, ByType, {}),
 4363: 	    case lists:sum(tuple_to_list(Hist)) of
 4364: 		ExpectBlks ->
 4365:                     ok;
 4366: 		Blks ->
 4367:                     exit({line, Line, mismatch,
 4368:                           expected, ExpectBlks,
 4369:                           actual, Blks})
 4370: 	    end
 4371:     end,
 4372:     ok.
 4373: 
 4374: processes_term_proc_list_test(MustChk) ->
 4375:     Tester = self(),
 4376:     enable_internal_state(),
 4377:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 4378:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 4379:     WantReds = PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds + 10,
 4380:     #ptab_list_bif_info{tab_chunks = Chunks,
 4381: 	tab_chunks_size = ChunksSize,
 4382: 	tab_indices_per_red = IndiciesPerRed
 4383:     } = PBInfo,
 4384:     true = Chunks > 1,
 4385:     true = Chunks*ChunksSize >= IndiciesPerRed*WantReds,
 4386:     Processes = fun () ->
 4387: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,
 4388: 		WantReds),
 4389: 	    processes()
 4390:     end,
 4391:     Exit = fun (P) ->
 4392: 	    unlink(P),
 4393: 	    exit(P, bang),
 4394: 	    wait_until(
 4395: 		fun () ->
 4396: 			not lists:member(
 4397: 			    P,
 4398: 			    erts_debug:get_internal_state(
 4399: 				processes))
 4400: 		end)
 4401:     end,
 4402:     SpawnSuspendProcessesProc = fun () ->
 4403: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4404: 		  P = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4405: 					 Tester ! {suspend_me, self()},
 4406: 					 Tester ! {self(),
 4407: 						   done,
 4408: 						   hd(Processes())},
 4409: 					 receive after infinity -> ok end
 4410: 				 end),
 4411: 		  receive {suspend_me, P} -> ok end,
 4412: 		  erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4413: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4414: 		  [{status,suspended},
 4415: 		   {current_function,{erlang,ptab_list_continue,2}}]
 4416: 		      = process_info(P, [status, current_function]),
 4417: 		  P
 4418: 	  end,
 4419:     ResumeProcessesProc = fun (P) ->
 4420: 					erlang:resume_process(P),
 4421: 					receive {P, done, _} -> ok end
 4422: 				end,
 4423:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4424:     HangAround = fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4425:     HA1 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4426:     HA2 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4427:     HA3 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4428:     S1 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4429:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4430:     Exit(HA1),
 4431:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4432:     S2 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4433:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4434:     S3 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4435:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4436:     Exit(HA2),
 4437:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4438:     S4 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4439:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4440:     Exit(HA3),
 4441:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4442:     ResumeProcessesProc(S1),
 4443:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4444:     ResumeProcessesProc(S3),
 4445:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4446:     ResumeProcessesProc(S4),
 4447:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4448:     ResumeProcessesProc(S2),
 4449:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4450:     Exit(S1),
 4451:     Exit(S2),
 4452:     Exit(S3),
 4453:     Exit(S4),
 4454: 
 4455: 
 4456:     HA4 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4457:     HA5 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4458:     HA6 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4459:     S5 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4460:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4461:     Exit(HA4),
 4462:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4463:     S6 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4464:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4465:     Exit(HA5),
 4466:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4467:     S7 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4468:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4469:     Exit(HA6),
 4470:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4471:     S8 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4472:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4473: 
 4474:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4475:     Exit(S8),
 4476:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4477:     Exit(S5),
 4478:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4479:     Exit(S7),
 4480:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4481:     Exit(S6),
 4482:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4483:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4484:     as_expected.
 4485: 
 4486: 
 4487: otp_7738_waiting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4488:     otp_7738_test(waiting).
 4489: 
 4490: otp_7738_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4491:     otp_7738_test(suspended).
 4492: 
 4493: otp_7738_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4494:     otp_7738_test(resume).
 4495: 
 4496: otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4497:     sys_mem_cond_run(3072, fun () -> do_otp_7738_test(Type) end).
 4498: 
 4499: do_otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4500:     T = self(),
 4501:     S = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4502: 		receive
 4503: 		    {suspend, Suspendee} ->
 4504: 			erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 4505: 			T ! {suspended, Suspendee},
 4506: 			receive
 4507: 			after 10 ->
 4508: 				erlang:resume_process(Suspendee),
 4509: 				Suspendee ! wake_up
 4510: 			end;
 4511: 		    {send, To, Msg} ->
 4512: 			receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4513: 			To ! Msg
 4514: 		end
 4515: 	end),
 4516:     R = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4517: 		X = lists:seq(1, 20000000),
 4518: 		T ! {initialized, self()},
 4519: 		case Type of
 4520: 		    _ when Type == suspended;
 4521: 		Type == waiting ->
 4522: 		    receive _ -> ok end;
 4523: 		_ when Type == resume ->
 4524: 		    Receive = fun (F) ->
 4525: 			    receive
 4526: 				_ ->
 4527: 				    ok
 4528: 			    after 0 ->
 4529: 				    F(F)
 4530: 			    end
 4531: 		    end,
 4532: 		    Receive(Receive)
 4533: 	    end,
 4534: 	    T ! {woke_up, self()},
 4535: 	    id(X)
 4536:     end),
 4537:     receive {initialized, R} -> ok end,
 4538:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4539:     case Type of
 4540: 	      suspended ->
 4541: 		  erlang:suspend_process(R),
 4542: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4543: 	      waiting ->
 4544: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4545: 	      resume ->
 4546: 		  S ! {suspend, R},
 4547: 		  receive {suspended, R} -> ok end
 4548: 	  end,
 4549:     erlang:garbage_collect(R),
 4550:     case Type of
 4551: 	      suspended ->
 4552: 		  erlang:resume_process(R);
 4553: 	      _ ->
 4554: 		  ok
 4555: 	  end,
 4556:     receive
 4557: 	      {woke_up, R} ->
 4558: 		  ok
 4559: 	  after 2000 ->
 4560: 		  I = process_info(R, [status, message_queue_len]),
 4561: 		  io:format("~p~n", [I]),
 4562: 		  ct:fail(no_progress)
 4563: 	  end,
 4564:     ok.
 4565: 
 4566: gor(Reds, Stop) ->
 4567:     receive
 4568: 	drop_me ->
 4569: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);	    
 4570: 	{From, reds} ->
 4571: 	    From ! {reds, Reds, self()},
 4572: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);
 4573: 	{From, Stop} ->
 4574: 	    From ! {stopped, Stop, Reds, self()}
 4575:     after 0 ->
 4576: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop)
 4577:     end.
 4578: 
 4579: garb_other_running(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4580:     Stop = make_ref(),
 4581:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () -> gor(0, Stop) end),
 4582:     Reds = lists:foldl(fun (N, OldReds) ->
 4583: 			             case N rem 2 of
 4584: 					 0 -> Pid ! drop_me;
 4585: 					 _ -> ok
 4586: 				     end,
 4587: 				     erlang:garbage_collect(Pid),
 4588: 				     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4589: 				     Pid ! {self(), reds},
 4590: 				     receive
 4591: 					       {reds, NewReds, Pid} ->
 4592: 						   true = (NewReds > OldReds),
 4593: 						   NewReds
 4594: 					   end
 4595: 			     end,
 4596: 			     0,
 4597: 			     lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4598:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4599:     Pid ! {self(), Stop},
 4600:     receive
 4601: 	      {stopped, Stop, StopReds, Pid} ->
 4602: 		  true = (StopReds > Reds)
 4603: 	  end,
 4604:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, normal} -> ok end,
 4605:     ok.
 4606: 
 4607: no_priority_inversion(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4608:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4609:     Master = self(),
 4610:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4611:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4612: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4613:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4614: 					       tok_loop()
 4615: 				       end,
 4616: 				       [{priority, high},
 4617:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4618:                                         monitor,
 4619:                                         link])
 4620: 		     end,
 4621: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4622:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, HTLs),
 4623:     LTL = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4624: 			    tok_loop()
 4625: 		    end,
 4626: 		    [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4627:     false = erlang:check_process_code(element(1, LTL), nonexisting_module),
 4628:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(element(1, LTL)),
 4629:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4630: 			  unlink(P),
 4631: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4632: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4633:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4634: 			  receive
 4635: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4636: 				  ok
 4637: 			  end
 4638: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4639:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4640:     ok.
 4641: 
 4642: no_priority_inversion2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4643:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4644:     Master = self(),
 4645:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4646:     MTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4647: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4648:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4649: 					       tok_loop()
 4650: 				       end,
 4651: 				       [{priority, max},
 4652:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4653:                                         monitor, link])
 4654: 		     end,
 4655: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4656:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, MTLs),
 4657:     {PL, ML} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4658: 			       tok_loop()
 4659: 		       end,
 4660: 		       [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4661:     RL = request_test(PL, low),
 4662:     RN = request_test(PL, normal),
 4663:     RH = request_test(PL, high),
 4664:     receive
 4665: 	{system_task_test, _, _} ->
 4666: 	    ct:fail(unexpected_system_task_completed)
 4667:     after 1000 ->
 4668: 	    ok
 4669:     end,
 4670:     RM = request_test(PL, max),
 4671:     receive
 4672: 	{system_task_test, RM, true} ->
 4673: 	    ok
 4674:     end,
 4675:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4676: 			  unlink(P),
 4677: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4678: 		  end, MTLs),
 4679:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4680: 			  receive
 4681: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4682: 				  ok
 4683: 			  end
 4684: 		  end, MTLs),
 4685:     receive
 4686: 	{system_task_test, RH, true} ->
 4687: 	    ok
 4688:     end,
 4689:     receive
 4690: 	{system_task_test, RN, true} ->
 4691: 	    ok
 4692:     end,
 4693:     receive
 4694: 	{system_task_test, RL, true} ->
 4695: 	    ok
 4696:     end,
 4697:     unlink(PL),
 4698:     exit(PL, kill),
 4699:     receive
 4700: 	{'DOWN', ML, process, PL, killed} ->
 4701: 	    ok
 4702:     end,
 4703:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4704:     ok.
 4705: 
 4706: request_test(Pid, Prio) ->
 4707:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4708:     erts_internal:request_system_task(Pid, Prio, {system_task_test, Ref}),
 4709:     Ref.
 4710: 
 4711: system_task_blast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4712:     Me = self(),
 4713:     GCReq = fun () ->
 4714: 		    RL = test_req(Me, 100),
 4715: 		    lists:foreach(fun (R) ->
 4716: 					  receive
 4717: 					      {system_task_test, R, true} ->
 4718: 						  ok
 4719: 					  end
 4720: 				  end, RL),
 4721: 		    exit(it_worked)
 4722: 	    end,
 4723:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (_) -> spawn_monitor(GCReq) end, lists:seq(1, 1000)),
 4724:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4725: 			  receive
 4726: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, it_worked} ->
 4727: 				  ok
 4728: 			  end
 4729: 		  end, HTLs),
 4730:     ok.
 4731: 
 4732: test_req(_Pid, 0) ->
 4733:     [];
 4734: test_req(Pid, N) ->
 4735:     R0 = request_test(Pid, low),
 4736:     R1 = request_test(Pid, normal),
 4737:     R2 = request_test(Pid, high),
 4738:     R3 = request_test(Pid, max),
 4739:     [R0, R1, R2, R3 | test_req(Pid, N-1)].
 4740: 
 4741: system_task_on_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4742:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 4743: 				   tok_loop()
 4744: 			   end),
 4745:     true = erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4746:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4747:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(P),
 4748:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4749:     true = erlang:resume_process(P),
 4750:     false = ({status, suspended} == process_info(P, status)),
 4751:     exit(P, kill),
 4752:     receive
 4753: 	{'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4754: 	    ok
 4755:     end.
 4756: 
 4757: %% When a system task couldn't be enqueued due to the process being in an
 4758: %% incompatible state, it would linger in the system task list and get executed
 4759: %% anyway the next time the process was scheduled. This would result in a
 4760: %% double-free at best.
 4761: %%
 4762: %% This test continuously purges modules while other processes run dirty code,
 4763: %% which will provoke this error as ERTS_PSTT_CPC can't be enqueued while a
 4764: %% process is running dirty code.
 4765: system_task_failed_enqueue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4766:     case erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) of
 4767:         N when N > 0 ->
 4768:             system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config);
 4769:         _ ->
 4770:             {skipped, "No dirty scheduler support"}
 4771:     end.
 4772: 
 4773: system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config) ->
 4774:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4775: 
 4776:     Purgers = [spawn_link(fun() -> purge_loop(Priv, Id) end)
 4777:                || Id <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers))],
 4778:     Hogs = [spawn_link(fun() -> dirty_loop() end)
 4779:             || _ <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers))],
 4780: 
 4781:     ct:sleep(5000),
 4782: 
 4783:     [begin
 4784:          unlink(Pid),
 4785:          exit(Pid, kill)
 4786:      end || Pid <- (Purgers ++ Hogs)],
 4787: 
 4788:     ok.
 4789: 
 4790: purge_loop(PrivDir, Id) ->
 4791:     Mod = "failed_enq_" ++ integer_to_list(Id),
 4792:     Path = PrivDir ++ "/" ++ Mod,
 4793:     file:write_file(Path ++ ".erl",
 4794:                     "-module('" ++ Mod ++ "').\n" ++
 4795:                         "-export([t/0]).\n" ++
 4796:                         "t() -> ok."),
 4797:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4798: purge_loop_1(Path) ->
 4799:     {ok, Mod} = compile:file(Path, []),
 4800:     erlang:delete_module(Mod),
 4801:     erts_code_purger:purge(Mod),
 4802:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4803: 
 4804: dirty_loop() ->
 4805:     ok = erts_debug:dirty_cpu(reschedule, 10000),
 4806:     dirty_loop().
 4807: 
 4808: gc_request_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4809:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4810:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ref),
 4811:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(immed),
 4812:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS).
 4813: 
 4814: gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ReqIdType) ->
 4815:     Master = self(),
 4816:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4817: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4818: 								    false),
 4819: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4820: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4821: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, true},
 4822: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4823: 								     true),
 4824: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4825: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4826:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4827:     ReqId = case ReqIdType of
 4828:                 ref -> make_ref();
 4829:                 immed -> immed
 4830:             end,
 4831:     async = garbage_collect(P, [{async, ReqId}]),
 4832:     receive
 4833: 	{garbage_collect, ReqId, Result} ->
 4834: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_gc, Result});
 4835: 	{P, gc_state, true} ->
 4836: 	    ok
 4837:     end,
 4838:     receive {garbage_collect, ReqId, true} -> ok end,
 4839:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4840:     ok.
 4841: 
 4842: gc_request_blast_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4843:     Master = self(),
 4844:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4845:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4846: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4847: 								    false),
 4848: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4849: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4850: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4851: 								     true),
 4852: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4853: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4854:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4855:     PMs = lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4856: 			    Prio = case N rem 4 of
 4857: 				       0 -> max;
 4858: 				       1 -> high;
 4859: 				       2 -> normal;
 4860: 				       3 -> low
 4861: 				   end,
 4862: 			    spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4863: 					      erlang:garbage_collect(P)
 4864: 				      end, [monitor, link, {priority, Prio}])
 4865: 		    end, lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4866:     lists:foreach(fun ({Proc, Mon}) ->
 4867: 			  receive
 4868: 			      {'DOWN', Mon, process, Proc, normal} ->
 4869: 				  ok
 4870: 			  end
 4871: 		  end,
 4872: 		  PMs),
 4873:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS),
 4874:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4875:     ok.
 4876: 
 4877: otp_16436(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4878:     P = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4879:                           erts_debug:dirty_io(wait, 1000)
 4880:                   end,
 4881:                   [{priority,high},link]),
 4882:     erlang:check_process_code(P, non_existing),
 4883:     unlink(P),
 4884:     exit(P, kill),
 4885:     ok.
 4886: 
 4887: otp_16642(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4888:     %%
 4889:     %% Whitebox testing...
 4890:     %%
 4891:     %% Ensure that low prio system tasks are interleaved with
 4892:     %% normal prio system tasks as they should.
 4893:     %%
 4894:     process_flag(priority, high),
 4895:     process_flag(scheduler, 1),
 4896:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4897:                     [link, {scheduler, 1}]),
 4898:     ReqSTasks = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4899:                         lists:foreach(
 4900:                           fun (N) ->
 4901:                                   erts_internal:request_system_task(
 4902:                                     Pid,
 4903:                                     Prio,
 4904:                                     {system_task_test,
 4905:                                      {Prio, N}})
 4906:                           end,
 4907:                           lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4908:                 end,
 4909:     MkResList = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4910:                         lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4911:                                           {system_task_test,
 4912:                                            {Prio, N},
 4913:                                            true}
 4914:                                   end,
 4915:                                   lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4916:                 end,
 4917: 
 4918:     %%% Test when normal queue clears first...
 4919: 
 4920:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 4921:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 10),
 4922:     ReqSTasks(low, 2, 4),
 4923:     ReqSTasks(normal, 11, 26),
 4924: 
 4925:     Msgs1 = recv_msgs(32),
 4926:     io:format("Got test 1 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs1]),
 4927: 
 4928:     ExpMsgs1 =
 4929:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 4930:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 4931:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 4932:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 4933:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 23)
 4934:         ++ MkResList(low, 2, 2)
 4935:         ++ MkResList(normal, 24, 26)
 4936:         ++ MkResList(low, 3, 4),
 4937:     
 4938:     case Msgs1 =:= ExpMsgs1 of
 4939:         true ->
 4940:             ok;
 4941:         false ->
 4942:             io:format("Expected test 1 messages ~p~n",
 4943:                       [ExpMsgs1]),
 4944:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 4945:     end,
 4946: 
 4947:     receive Unexp1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp1})
 4948:     after 500 -> ok
 4949:     end,
 4950: 
 4951:     io:format("Test 1 as expected~n", []),
 4952: 
 4953:     %%% Test when low queue clears first...
 4954: 
 4955:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 4956:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 20),
 4957: 
 4958:     Msgs2 = recv_msgs(23),
 4959:     io:format("Got test 2 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs2]),
 4960: 
 4961:     ExpMsgs2 =
 4962:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 4963:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 4964:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 4965:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 4966:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 20),
 4967:     
 4968:     case Msgs2 =:= ExpMsgs2 of
 4969:         true ->
 4970:             ok;
 4971:         false ->
 4972:             io:format("Expected test 2 messages ~p~n",
 4973:                       [ExpMsgs2]),
 4974:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 4975:     end,
 4976: 
 4977:     receive Unexp2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp2})
 4978:     after 500 -> ok
 4979:     end,
 4980: 
 4981:     io:format("Test 2 as expected~n", []),
 4982: 
 4983:     unlink(Pid),
 4984:     exit(Pid, kill),
 4985:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 4986:     ok.
 4987: 
 4988: alias_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4989:     alias_bif_test(node()),
 4990:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4991:     alias_bif_test(Node),
 4992:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4993:     ok.
 4994: 
 4995: alias_bif_test(Node) ->
 4996:     A1 = alias(),
 4997:     {P1, M1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4998:                              fun () ->
 4999:                                      A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5000:                                      A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5001:                                      [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5002:                                      A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5003:                                      A1 ! {A1, 4}
 5004:                              end),
 5005:     [{A1,1},{A1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5006:     unalias(A1),
 5007:     P1 ! {A1, continue},
 5008:     [{'DOWN', M1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5009: 
 5010:     A2 = alias([explicit_unalias]),
 5011:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5012:                              fun () ->
 5013:                                      A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5014:                                      A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5015:                                      [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5016:                                      A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5017:                                      A2 ! {A2, 4}
 5018:                              end),
 5019:     [{A2,1},{A2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5020:     unalias(A2),
 5021:     P2 ! {A2, continue},
 5022:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5023:     
 5024:     A3 = alias([reply]),
 5025:     {_P3, M3} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5026:                               fun () ->
 5027:                                       A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5028:                                       A3 ! {A3, 2},
 5029:                                       A3 ! {A3, 3},
 5030:                                       A3 ! {A3, 4}
 5031:                               end),
 5032:     [{A3,1},{'DOWN', M3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5033:     ok.
 5034: 
 5035: dist_frag_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5036:     Tester = self(),
 5037:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5038:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5039:                           fun () ->
 5040:                                   Alias = alias(),
 5041:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 5042:                                   receive
 5043:                                       {data, Data} ->
 5044:                                           garbage_collect(),
 5045:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data}
 5046:                                   end,
 5047:                                   exit(end_of_test)
 5048:                           end),
 5049:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 5050:     receive
 5051:         {alias, Alias} ->
 5052:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5053:             receive
 5054:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 5055:                     Data = RecvData;
 5056:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 5057:                     ct:fail(R2)
 5058:             end;
 5059:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 5060:             ct:fail(R1)
 5061:     end,
 5062:     receive
 5063:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 5064:             end_of_test = R3
 5065:     end,
 5066:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5067:     ok.
 5068: 
 5069: dist_frag_unaliased(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5070:     %% Leak fixed by PR-7915 would have been detected using asan or valgrind
 5071:     %% when running this test...
 5072:     Tester = self(),
 5073:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5074:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5075:                           fun () ->
 5076:                                   Alias = alias(),
 5077:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 5078:                                   receive
 5079:                                       {data, Data} ->
 5080:                                           garbage_collect(),
 5081:                                           unalias(Alias),
 5082:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data},
 5083:                                           receive
 5084:                                               {data, _Data} ->
 5085:                                                   exit(received_data_again);
 5086:                                               end_of_test ->
 5087:                                                   exit(end_of_test)
 5088:                                           end
 5089:                                   end
 5090:                           end),
 5091:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 5092:     receive
 5093:         {alias, Alias} ->
 5094:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5095:             receive
 5096:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 5097:                     Data = RecvData;
 5098:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 5099:                     ct:fail(R2)
 5100:             end,
 5101:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5102:             P ! end_of_test;
 5103:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 5104:             ct:fail(R1)
 5105:     end,
 5106:     receive
 5107:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 5108:             end_of_test = R3
 5109:     end,
 5110:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5111:     ok.
 5112: 
 5113: monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5114:     monitor_alias_test(node()),
 5115:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5116:     monitor_alias_test(Node),
 5117:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5118:     ok.
 5119: 
 5120: monitor_alias_test(Node) ->
 5121:     P1 = spawn(Node,
 5122:                fun () ->
 5123:                        [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5124:                        A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5125:                        A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5126:                        [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5127:                        A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5128:                        A1 ! {A1, 4}
 5129:                end),
 5130:     MA1 = monitor(process, P1, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5131:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 5132:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5133:     unalias(MA1),
 5134:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 5135:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5136: 
 5137:     P2 = spawn(Node,
 5138:                fun () ->
 5139:                        [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5140:                        A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5141:                        A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5142:                        [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5143:                        A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5144:                        A2 ! {A2, 4}
 5145:                end),
 5146:     MA2 = monitor(process, P2, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 5147:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 5148:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5149:     demonitor(MA2),
 5150:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 5151:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 5152:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5153: 
 5154:     P3 = spawn(Node,
 5155:                fun () ->
 5156:                        [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5157:                        A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5158:                        A3 ! {A3, 2}
 5159:                end),
 5160:     MA3 = monitor(process, P3, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 5161:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5162:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5163:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5164:                                   fun () ->
 5165:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5166:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4}
 5167:                                   end),
 5168:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5169:     
 5170:     P4 = spawn(Node,
 5171:                fun () ->
 5172:                        [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1)
 5173:                end),
 5174:     MA4 = monitor(process, P4, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 5175:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5176:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5177:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5178:                                   fun () ->
 5179:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5180:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4}
 5181:                                   end),
 5182:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5183: 
 5184:     P5 = spawn(Node,
 5185:                fun () ->
 5186:                        [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5187:                        A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5188:                        A5 ! {A5, 2}
 5189:                end),
 5190:     MA5 = monitor(process, P5, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 5191:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5192:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5193:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5194: 
 5195:     ok.
 5196:     
 5197: 
 5198: spawn_monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5199:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5200:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons.
 5201:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, normal),
 5202:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5203:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, normal),
 5204:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5205:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5206:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, normal),
 5207:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5208:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5209:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5210:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_request, normal),
 5211:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5212:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5213:     ok.
 5214: 
 5215: spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, ExitReason) ->
 5216:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5217:                 spawn_opt ->
 5218:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5219:                             try
 5220:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5221:                             catch
 5222:                                 error:Err ->
 5223:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5224:                             end
 5225:                     end;
 5226:                 spawn_request ->
 5227:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5228:                             try
 5229:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5230:                                 receive
 5231:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5232:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5233:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5234:                                         error(Error)
 5235:                                 end
 5236:                             catch
 5237:                                 error:Err ->
 5238:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5239:                             end
 5240:                     end
 5241:             end,
 5242: 
 5243:     SpawnError = fun (OptList) ->
 5244:                          try
 5245:                              Spawn(fun () -> ok end, OptList),
 5246:                              error(ignored_error)
 5247:                          catch
 5248:                              error:{SpawnType, badarg} when SpawnType == spawn_opt ->
 5249:                                  ok;
 5250:                              error:{SpawnType, badopt} when SpawnType == spawn_request ->
 5251:                                  ok
 5252:                          end
 5253:                  end,
 5254: 
 5255:     SpawnError([{monitor, {{alias, explicit_unalias}}}]),
 5256:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{alias,alias}]}]),
 5257:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{aliases,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5258:     SpawnError([{monitors, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5259:     
 5260:     {P1, MA1} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5261:                               [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5262:                               A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5263:                               A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5264:                               [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5265:                               A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5266:                               A1 ! {A1, 4},
 5267:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5268:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5269:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 5270:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5271:     unalias(MA1),
 5272:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 5273:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5274: 
 5275:     {P2, MA2} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5276:                               [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5277:                               A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5278:                               A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5279:                               [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5280:                               A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5281:                               A2 ! {A2, 4},
 5282:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5283:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5284:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 5285:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5286:     demonitor(MA2),
 5287:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 5288:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 5289:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5290: 
 5291:     {P3, MA3} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5292:                               [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5293:                               A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5294:                               A3 ! {A3, 2},
 5295:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5296:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5297:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5298:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5299:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5300:                                   fun () ->
 5301:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5302:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4},
 5303:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5304:                                   end),
 5305:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5306:     
 5307:     {P4, MA4} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5308:                               [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5309:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5310:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5311:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5312:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5313:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5314:                                   fun () ->
 5315:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5316:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4},
 5317:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5318:                                   end),
 5319:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5320: 
 5321:     {P5, MA5} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5322:                               [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5323:                               A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5324:                               A5 ! {A5, 2},
 5325:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5326:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5327:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5328:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5329:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5330: 
 5331:     case Node == node() of
 5332:         true ->
 5333:             ok;
 5334:         false ->
 5335:             {P6, MA6} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5336:                                       [{alias, A6}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5337:                                       A6 ! {A6, 1},
 5338:                                       A6 ! {A6, 2},
 5339:                                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 5340:                               end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5341:             P6 ! {alias, MA6},
 5342:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5343:             [{MA6,1},{MA6,2},{'DOWN', MA6, _, _, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5344:             {_P6_1, M6_1} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 5345:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 3},
 5346:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 4}
 5347:                                           end),
 5348:             [{'DOWN', M6_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5349:     
 5350:             ok
 5351:     end.
 5352: 
 5353: demonitor_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5354:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5355:     Fun = fun () ->
 5356:                   receive
 5357:                       {alias, Alias} ->
 5358:                           Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5359:                   end
 5360:           end,
 5361:     LPid = spawn(Fun),
 5362:     RPid = spawn(Node, Fun),
 5363:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5364:     erlang:demonitor(AliasMonitor),
 5365:     LPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5366:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, LPid} -> ok end,
 5367:     %% Demonitor signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5368:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5369:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5370:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5371:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5372:     exit(LPid, kill),
 5373:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5374:     false = is_process_alive(LPid),
 5375:     ok.
 5376: 
 5377: down_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5378:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5379:     LPid = spawn(fun () -> receive infinty -> ok end end),
 5380:     RPid = spawn(Node,
 5381:                  fun () ->
 5382:                          receive
 5383:                              {alias, Alias} ->
 5384:                                  Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5385:                          end
 5386:                  end),
 5387:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5388:     exit(LPid, bye),
 5389:     receive {'DOWN', AliasMonitor, process, LPid, bye} -> ok end,
 5390:     %% Down signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5391:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5392:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5393:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5394:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5395:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5396:     ok.
 5397: 
 5398: monitor_tag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5399:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5400:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons, and
 5401:     %% immediate tags are stored in a different manner than
 5402:     %% compound tags.
 5403:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5404:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5405:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5406:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5407:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5408:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5409:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5410:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5411:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5412:     monitor_tag_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5413:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5414:     monitor_tag_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5415:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5416:     monitor_tag_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5417:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5418:     monitor_tag_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5419:     {ok, Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5420:     monitor_tag_test(Peer5, Node5, spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5421:     {ok, Peer6, Node6} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5422:     monitor_tag_test(Peer6, Node6, spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5423:     {ok, Peer7, Node7} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5424:     monitor_tag_test(Peer7, Node7, spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5425:     {ok, Peer8, Node8} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5426:     monitor_tag_test(Peer8, Node8, spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5427:     ok.
 5428: 
 5429: monitor_tag_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, Tag, ExitReason) ->
 5430: 
 5431:     P1 = spawn(Node, fun () -> receive go -> ok end, exit(ExitReason) end),
 5432:     M1 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5433:     P1 ! go,
 5434:     [{Tag, M1, process, P1, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5435: 
 5436:     M1_2 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5437:     [{Tag, M1_2, process, P1, noproc}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5438: 
 5439:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5440:                 spawn_opt ->
 5441:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5442:                             try
 5443:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5444:                             catch
 5445:                                 error:Err ->
 5446:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5447:                             end
 5448:                     end;
 5449:                 spawn_request ->
 5450:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5451:                             try
 5452:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5453:                                 receive
 5454:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5455:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5456:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5457:                                         error(Error)
 5458:                                 end
 5459:                             catch
 5460:                                 error:Err ->
 5461:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5462:                             end
 5463:                     end
 5464:             end,
 5465: 
 5466:     {P2, M2} = Spawn(fun () -> exit(ExitReason) end, [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5467:     [{Tag, M2, process, P2, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5468: 
 5469:     case Node == node() of
 5470:         true ->
 5471:             ok;
 5472:         false ->
 5473:             {P3, M3} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5474:                              [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5475:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5476:             [{Tag, M3, process, P3, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5477: 
 5478:             case SpawnType == spawn_opt of
 5479:                 true ->
 5480:                     {P6, M6} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5481:                                      [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5482:                     [{Tag, M6, process, P6, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1);
 5483:                 false ->
 5484:                     ok
 5485:             end,
 5486:             ok
 5487:     end.
 5488: 
 5489: no_pid_wrap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5490:     process_flag(priority, high),
 5491:     SOnln = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 5492:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5493:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5494:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 5495:     ChkSpwndPid = fun () ->
 5496:                           check_spawned_pid(Pid)
 5497:                   end,
 5498:     MPs = maps:from_list(lists:map(fun (_) ->
 5499:                                            {P, M} = spawn_monitor(ChkSpwndPid),
 5500:                                            {M, P}
 5501:                                    end, lists:seq(1, SOnln))),
 5502:     Res = receive
 5503:               {'DOWN', M, process, _, pid_reused} when is_map_key(M, MPs) ->
 5504:                   case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
 5505:                       8 ->
 5506:                           ct:fail("Process identifier reused"),
 5507:                           error;
 5508:                       4 ->
 5509:                           {comment,
 5510:                            "Process identifer reused, but this is"
 5511:                            ++ "expected since this is a 32-bit system"}
 5512:                   end;
 5513:               {'DOWN', _, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5514:                   ct:fail({unexpected_down, Down}),
 5515:                   error
 5516:           after
 5517:               3*60*1000 ->
 5518:                   ok
 5519:           end,
 5520:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5521:                          exit(P, kill)
 5522:                  end, MPs),
 5523:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5524:                          false = is_process_alive(P)
 5525:                  end, MPs),
 5526:     Res.
 5527: 
 5528: check_spawned_pid(OldPid) ->
 5529:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5530:     case OldPid == Pid of
 5531:         false ->
 5532:             check_spawned_pid(OldPid);
 5533:         true ->
 5534:             exit(pid_reused)
 5535:     end.
 5536: 
 5537: %% Internal functions
 5538: 
 5539: recv_msgs(N) ->
 5540:     recv_msgs(N, []).
 5541: 
 5542: recv_msgs(0, Msgs) ->
 5543:     lists:reverse(Msgs);
 5544: recv_msgs(N, Msgs) ->
 5545:     receive
 5546:         Msg ->
 5547:             recv_msgs(N-1, [Msg|Msgs])
 5548:     end.
 5549: 
 5550: wait_until(Fun) ->
 5551:     case Fun() of
 5552: 	true -> true;
 5553: 	false -> receive after 10 -> wait_until(Fun) end
 5554:     end.
 5555: 
 5556: tok_loop() ->
 5557:     tok_loop(hej).
 5558: 
 5559: tok_loop(hej) ->
 5560:     tok_loop(hopp);
 5561: tok_loop(hopp) ->
 5562:     tok_loop(hej).
 5563: 
 5564: id(I) -> I.
 5565: 
 5566: stop_node(Peer, Node) ->
 5567:     verify_nc(node()),
 5568:     verify_nc(Node),
 5569:     peer:stop(Peer).
 5570: 
 5571: verify_nc(Node) ->
 5572:     P = self(),
 5573:     Ref = make_ref(),
 5574:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 5575:                 fun() ->
 5576:                         R = erts_test_utils:check_node_dist(fun(E) -> E end),
 5577:                         P ! {Ref, R}
 5578:                 end),
 5579:     MonRef = monitor(process, Pid),
 5580:     receive
 5581:         {Ref, ok} ->
 5582:             demonitor(MonRef,[flush]),
 5583:             ok;
 5584:         {Ref, Error} ->
 5585:             ct:log("~s",[Error]),
 5586:             ct:fail(failed_nc_refc_check);
 5587:         {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5588:             ct:log("~p",[Down]),
 5589:             ct:fail(crashed_nc_refc_check)
 5590:     end.
 5591: 
 5592: enable_internal_state() ->
 5593:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state(available_internal_state) of
 5594: 	true -> true;
 5595: 	_ -> erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true)
 5596:     end.
 5597: 
 5598: sys_mem_cond_run(OrigReqSizeMB, TestFun) when is_integer(OrigReqSizeMB) ->
 5599:     %% Debug normally needs more memory, so double the requirement
 5600:     Debug = erlang:system_info(debug_compiled),
 5601:     ReqSizeMB = if Debug -> OrigReqSizeMB * 2; true -> OrigReqSizeMB end,
 5602:     case total_memory() of
 5603: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem), TotMem >= ReqSizeMB ->
 5604: 	    TestFun();
 5605: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem) ->
 5606: 	    {skipped, "Not enough memory ("++integer_to_list(TotMem)++" MB)"};
 5607: 	undefined ->
 5608: 	    {skipped, "Could not retrieve memory information"}
 5609:     end.
 5610: 
 5611: 
 5612: total_memory() ->
 5613:     %% Total memory in MB.
 5614:     try
 5615: 	SMD = memsup:get_system_memory_data(),
 5616:         TM = proplists:get_value(
 5617:                available_memory, SMD,
 5618:                proplists:get_value(
 5619:                  total_memory, SMD,
 5620:                  proplists:get_value(
 5621:                    system_total_memory, SMD))),
 5622:         TM div (1024*1024)
 5623:     catch
 5624: 	_ : _ ->
 5625: 	    undefined
 5626:     end.
 5627: 
 5628: start_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5629:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 5630:     FwdNodeExe = filename:join(DataDir, "fwd_node"),
 5631:     Name = atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 5632:         ++ "-" ++ "ei_node"
 5633:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(second))
 5634:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive])),
 5635:     Cookie = atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 5636:     HostName = get_hostname(),
 5637:     Node = list_to_atom(Name++"@"++HostName),
 5638:     Creation = integer_to_list(rand:uniform((1 bsl 15) - 4) + 3),
 5639:     Parent = self(),
 5640:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
 5641:                              register(cnode_forward_receiver, self()),
 5642:                              process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 5643:                              Args = ["-sname", Name,
 5644:                                      "-cookie", Cookie,
 5645:                                      "-creation", Creation],
 5646:                              io:format("Starting ei_node: ~p ~p~n",
 5647:                                        [FwdNodeExe, Args]),
 5648:                              Port = erlang:open_port({spawn_executable, FwdNodeExe},
 5649:                                                      [use_stdio, {args, Args}]),
 5650:                              receive
 5651:                                  {Port, {data, "accepting"}} -> ok
 5652:                              end,
 5653:                              ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port)
 5654:                      end),
 5655:     put({ei_node_handler, Node}, Pid),
 5656:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5657:         ok -> {ok, Node};
 5658:         Error -> Error
 5659:     end.
 5660: 
 5661: check_ei_node(Node) ->
 5662:     Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5663:     case get(Key) of
 5664:         undefined ->
 5665:             {error, no_handler};
 5666:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5667:             Pid ! {check_node, self()},
 5668:             receive
 5669:                 {check_node, Pid, Res} ->
 5670:                     Res
 5671:             after 3000 ->
 5672:                     {error, no_handler_response}
 5673:             end
 5674:     end.
 5675: 
 5676: stop_ei_node(Node) ->
 5677:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5678:         ok ->
 5679:             Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5680:             case get(Key) of
 5681:                 undefined ->
 5682:                     {error, no_handler};
 5683:                 Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5684:                     Pid ! {stop_node, self()},
 5685:                     receive
 5686:                         {stop_node, Pid} ->
 5687:                             put(Key, undefined),
 5688:                             ok
 5689:                     after 2000 ->
 5690:                             {error, no_handler_response}
 5691:                     end
 5692:             end;
 5693:         Error ->
 5694:             Error
 5695:     end.
 5696: 
 5697: ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port) ->
 5698:     receive
 5699:         {'EXIT', Parent, Reason} ->
 5700:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5701:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5702:             exit(Reason);
 5703:         {stop_node, Parent} ->
 5704:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5705:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5706:             Parent ! {stop_node, self()},
 5707:             exit(normal);
 5708:         {check_node, Parent} ->
 5709:             Ref = make_ref(),
 5710:             {a_name, Node} ! Ref,
 5711:             receive
 5712:                 Ref ->
 5713:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), ok}
 5714:             after
 5715:                 2000 ->
 5716:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), {error, no_node_response}}
 5717:             end;
 5718:         Msg ->
 5719:             Msgs = fetch_all_messages([Msg]),
 5720:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5721:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5722:             exit({ei_node_handler, Node, unexpected_messages, Msgs})
 5723:     end,
 5724:     ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port).
 5725: 
 5726: fetch_all_messages(Msgs) ->
 5727:     receive
 5728:         Msg ->
 5729:             fetch_all_messages([Msg|Msgs])
 5730:     after
 5731:         0 ->
 5732:             Msgs
 5733:     end.
 5734: 
 5735: get_hostname() ->
 5736:     get_hostname(atom_to_list(node())).
 5737: 
 5738: get_hostname([$@ | HostName]) ->
 5739:     HostName;
 5740: get_hostname([_ | Rest]) ->
 5741:     get_hostname(Rest).
 5742: 
 5743: receive_any() ->
 5744:     receive M -> M end.
